item.title: Scratchpad
item.description: Home Network QNAP Container station Virtualization station gatekeeper (sesame) Gate for access from outside world to LAN hassio - ubuntu server using to serve hassio, potentially more servers pfSense hassio Installing hassio https://community.home-assistant.io/t/my-way-to-install-hassio-on-qnap-nas/92257 Hugo JS and HTML interaction Hugo directory structure Note that when you are using shortcode, and that shortcode uses a JSscript sitting the the static page Makesure you import that JS script as an absolute path
